title: U.S. and other nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’ of former security forces
content:
1. U.S. and other nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’ of former security forces  NBC News
  2. US and other countries 'deeply concerned by reports of summary killings' in Afghanistan  CNN
  3. Western countries express concern over Afghan reprisals, Taliban reject accusations  Reuters
  4. 21 nations, EU express concern over reported killings, disappearances of former Afghan security force members  The Hill
  5. US, EU and 20 nations condemn Taliban over ‘summary killings’  Aljazeera.com
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 米国をはじめとする各国は、タリバンによる元治安部隊の「略式殺害」を非難しています。
美国和其他国家谴责塔利班对前安全部队的 "即决处决"。
美國和其他國家譴責塔利班對前安全部隊的 "即決處決"。
